resources.string: \ Our Tank War Game application is based on Android platform.The game features battle tanks of enemies and the objective of the game is to shoot and destroy these tanks. Player controls one tank to move, to hide behind walls, to shoot enemy tanks (application controlled) to win the game. This game application provides an entertainment option for Android Mobile users. And It is a fun game to play!

\ Our Tank War Game application is based on Android platform.The game features battle tanks of enemies and the objective of the game is to shoot and destroy these tanks.
